headline: Four Opinion Writers Ask After Vance Win and Roe Leak: Is This Trumps World Now?

For Republican voters in Ohio, the fundamental choice was between Josh Mandel, who was basically the Trump attitude but with the pre-Trump mix of economic policies  thats why Mandel was endorsed by the Club for Growth and they poured all this money into defeating Vance  or Vance, who was channeling the Trump attitude, but with policies on trade and immigration and foreign policy that were much more like the shift that Trump brought.
